author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Tamil audio CD of Shirdi Saibaba Aarathi Vazhipadu penned by Dr A. Balasubramanian, Dean, Faculty of Science and Technology, University of Mysore and former Director of Pondicherry University was launched here on Sunday.

Dr J. Sampath, Registrar-in-charge of Pondicherry University released the CD by handing over first copy to V. Janarthanan, trustee of the Shri Shirdi Saibaba Charitable Trust.

A booklet on ‘Aarathi Vazhipadu’ was released by Dr. Mukundraj, Mysore Minerals Ltd, Bangalore.

J. Duraikannu, secretary of Shri Shirdi Saibaba Seva Samithi received the first copy.

Senior officials, faculties and non-teaching staff of the University, trustees of Saibaba Seva Samithi, and devotees participated. Music director K. Gandhidasan of Chennai was felicitated.
title: Audio CD of Shirdi Sai released
